TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed NodeAffinity extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumerated data type that determines where projects are built.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Build.Execution.NodeAffinity Any = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The project may be scheduled anywhere.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Build.Execution.NodeAffinity InProc = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The project may only be scheduled on the in-proc node. This happens automatically if there is a host object or if a ProjectInstance was specified. A host may wish to specify it if they know a task depends explicitly on shared static data or other host-provided objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Build.Execution.NodeAffinity OutOfProc = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The project may only be scheduled on an out-of-proc node. A host may wish to specify this if it is known the project being built could contaminate the host environment (or the host contaminates the environment while a build is proceeding.)
